title: Business card ID \>\>\>\>\>\>\>\>\>\>\>\> ?
content:
Can anybody Identify the large central typeface and the smaller face used on the business cards in the attached photo?  
You may need to zoom into the image a little to do this...

Many Thanks in advance.

Much appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_4902.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011004907/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4902.JPG) | 213.16 KB |

 [‹ FUND type id](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011004907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45473 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does anyone have this?!?!?!?! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011004907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45471 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ashleyco

comments.content:
Wait, This has been ID’ed before/already. _(Miss Tiff and I already seemed to have solved this. Where has the original thread gone? Hmm. Strange things happening. Is there something wrong with Typophile?)_

Anyway, It’s ’Times’ and ’Akzidenz Grotesk’.

Dav
